name: StructureCondition
title: Structure Condition
description: Structure Condition codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Building or structure is in pristine or near-new condition with no visible defects or deterioration
Building or structure shows minimal wear with only minor cosmetic issues and is well-maintained
Building or structure is properly maintained with normal wear appropriate to its age but no significant defects
Building or structure shows moderate wear and some deferred maintenance but remains functional and structurally sound
Building or structure shows considerable wear with visible deterioration requiring attention, though still habitable or usable
Building or structure has significant deterioration, structural issues, or extensive deferred maintenance requiring major repairs
Building or structure is severely deteriorated or partially collapsed with major structural failures
